resp = client.indices.create(
    index="cjk_bigram_example",
    settings={
        "analysis": {
            "analyzer": {
                "han_bigrams": {
                    "tokenizer": "standard",
                    "filter": [
                        "han_bigrams_filter"
                    ]
                }
            },
            "filter": {
                "han_bigrams_filter": {
                    "type": "cjk_bigram",
                    "ignored_scripts": [
                        "hangul",
                        "hiragana",
                        "katakana"
                    ],
                    "output_unigrams": True
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
